def _readFinish(self):
        self._status = 0
        if "esc" in self._pressSet:  # 含esc，则为退出
            PubSubService.publish(self._readFinishTitle, "")
        else:
            names = _KeyTranslator.set2names(self._pressSet)
            PubSubService.publish(self._readFinishTitle, names)
